wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Leonard Traub (born 6 December 1988 in Dunfermline), is a Scottish football defender who plays for Sauchie.

response: | Andrew Traub ||  Clyde || Free Clyde's Hendry snaps up quartet, BBC News, 2 August 2007

*2 – Colin Hendry makes his first signings. English midfielder Christian Smith, ex-Airdrie United defender Craig Potter, former Celtic youth Andrew Traub and goalkeeper David Thomson all join the club. Striker Gary Arbuckle signs a new contract.Four players signed
